div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1368 Asia Minor, northern, c. 1970 Burial: c. 265 B.C. (M) Contents: 35+ AR Alexander III: 26 (27?) tetradr. (Amphi- polis 7, Pella 1?, unc. Greece 1, Sicyon 1, Sardes 1, Colophon 1, Tarsus 1, Carrhae 1, Babylon 12, Babylon or Seleuceia 1) Philip III: 6 tetradr. (Salamis 1, Babylon 5) Imit. Philip III: 1 tetradr. (E. Celts) Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (Susa as ESM, no. 349) Disposition: Hirsch, July 1, 1970, 71-4, 75 ?, 76-7, 79-94, 96, 98-100, 106-12, 211-2 Information from C. Boehringer
